actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill entitled the "Riverdale, North Dakota, School Rehabilitation Act".

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Development Act, 1986 to authorize the Corps of Engineers to rehabilitate the existing school building at Riverdale, North Dakota, which was transferred to such community, in order to bring such building up to State standards for continued safe operation.

titles.title: A bill entitled the "Riverdale, North Dakota, School Rehabilitation Act".
